attributes.action: Declare 48 hours no fly zone over Ukraine so that civilians can escape to safety
attributes.additional_details: UK must be committed to upholding safety of war refugees
attributes.background: UK and Nato must immediately establish a 48 hour no fly zone over Ukraine so that civilians can escape to safety.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
